name: Digital Sparta
description:
Digital Sparta is developing award-winning custom mobile solutions for businesses and enterprises. Our innovative approach and 10+ years of experience in software development allows us to create cost effective and high quality applications - cross-platform, customized and ready-to-go. Since 2007, we have built more than 250 mobile projects for our clients in e-commerce, telecom, banking, tourism, conference, media, health care and other industries.
Our platform competencies cover iOS, Android, Windows, native and cross-platform development.
Digital Sparta is headquartered in San Francisco, CA with development office in Novosibirsk, Russia. The companyâ€™s partners are working in the U.S., UK, Germany, Brazil, India, Japan and other countries.
Products: Appercode, Konferenza.
